title: PHP Build Target
description: PHP test target options for Build Facade.

maxBatchSize.description: Max batch size (only for functional mode).

parallel.description: Whether to run the tests in parallel or not.

processes.description: The number of test processes to run.

useFunctionalMode.description: Whether to use the functional mode or not.

useWrapperRunner.description: Whether to use the WrapperRunner or not.
